name: Miscellaneous Repair Shops and Related Services
tcc: R for face-to-face transactions.\nT for nonâ€“face-to-face transactions.
description:
Merchants that exclusively provide service and repair work, but that
cannot be classified under a more specific repair work MCC. Such
merchants include those that repair large household appliances (for
example, ovens, washers, dryers, dishwashers, and water heaters),
bicycles and sporting equipment, hearing aids, orthopedic and
prosthetic devices, musical instruments, tents and awnings, camera
and other photographic equipment, lawnmowers, luggage, leather
goods, swimming pools, electric razors, and typewriters. Also includes
machine shops and merchants that clean and service furnaces and
chimneys.
